allapu gedara padam karamin siti kolla allagena gos tayar mada gini thabuwe uu kotiyeku nisa nowana bawa mathak kala yuthuyi. 71-89 yuga thula polawa yata giya dakune dasadahas gananak sinhala tharunayan saha adatath dakune hamuwana sinhala daruwange samuha miniwawal un mara aanduwe kulihamudawata erehiwa yukthiya illamin ee atakatu polawa yata sita hadana bawa yakshayage deshaye batalu ralata amathaka wi atha.

mulika washayen bhasha puhunu ha sanskruthika danuma perabima thula siwil sancharakayage wenuwen peni athara, uthum pawatha da, wenath rajakiya adhikarana samaga watina sabandatha owunge gaman magin sthapitha owunge sirith wirith shuddha, kadu harambaa kalawa praguna kala yuthu, nila nowana shrungarathmaka athdakim kirimata ha wiwaha wikalpa pariksha karanna.
wamanshikayan satan kala yuththe lingika shrama sewa welandapola nidahas kara ganimataya.

wisanwadayen thora deshapalanayak gana wadibana deshana kala ranil wika්ramasinha mahatha athulu ethuma ge anugamikayan wana eksath jathika pakshaye ‘norwejiyanu nikaya’ ada husmak katak ganna bari thaththwayakata pathwela.ee nisa monawa hari deyak janadhipathithuma athulu rajayata kiyamin ee ayage adahas wikruthi karamin wenas artha kathanayak demin ape rate swadhinathwayata akul helala kotinta udaw karana antharjathika sanwidhanawalata upakara kirime abhilashayen mewani yojana kirima gana api kanagatu wenawa.ti.bi. eekanayaka mahamarga amathyajathiye thiranathmaka mohothak elambaila eekiya jathiyak eekiya dhajayak yatathe ratata samaya uda wena awasthawaka sampa්radayika kalpitha lokayaka jiwath wemin wada wiwada karanna janadhipathithumata awashya naha.janathawa wenuwen kapawi pa්rayogikawa wadakarana yugayak bihi kala janadhipathithumata jathiye pa්ranamaya uththamacharaya pidiya yuthu welawak.
deshapalana sirakaruwan pilibandawa, thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha pilibandawa saha yudha aparadha chodana pilibandawa deshapalana sirakaruwan nidahas karaganime wyaparaye em.
ekak nisa oyage pariganakaye

eya lagath nathi de thamayi uththara..
mata me githaya hoyala denna puluwanda?
mata hithena saralama uththare....
eya bududahamata ekaga ya.
in anathuruwa payakata aasanna kalayak gathawimath samanga jawaramkaruwan nawatha pamina aththe ganudenuwa nima kirime aramunin yuthuwa ran pilimayada ragenaya.
‘poddak hitapan machchan’ kiyala kotiyata kagahala kiyala, aapahu goniya ellagannawa……….

mema uthum charithaya daye prathama kanthawa wima lakwasi apa lada bhagyayaki.janapathi aarya shiranthi wikramasinha rajapaksha mathiniyage uganda sancharaya shri lankawata athishaya kirthiyak gena dun behewin sarthaka sancharayak bawa sandahan kala yuthuya.

meya prayogikawa prayojanawath wargikaranayak wuwada bhasha wenaskama harunu wita siyalu sampradayan bandi athi podu karunu da athi bawin darshanawadi ha aagamika matha wargikaranaya sandaha meya sudusu nowe.

mage ananyatha pathraya, riyaduru balapathraya, wahanaya sathu siyaluma liyakiyawili (wahana dekak apa gamanata sambandha wana nisa hadisi aapadawak wunoth prayojana ganimata) wishala mudalak pamanak nowa apa ge niwase gettuwe ha athulatha siyaluma dora yathuru athulu watina de rashiyak ee athara wiya.mage imahath kalabalaya iwen men pasak karagath prawesha pathra kawuluwe siti niladhari mahatha ma kerehi dadi suparikshawen sitina bawa ma dutuwe ahambeni.
mage wiwahaya nam siduwela dan tika kalayak wenawa.
kalani ganga saha gurugoda oya me pedesa sarawath karanawa.
palath palana chandaya pramadawima ek parshawayakata pamanak nowa rate siyaluma janathawata balapana bawa mathiwarana komisame sabhapathi mahinda deshapriya pawasayi.
mawa gabiniyak nam nupan bilindata melowa eliya perama mema ahithakara thaththwayata muhuna dimata siduwe.
ee handin premarathnage hadawatha ekwarama gassi giyada ohu biyata path wune natha.
awurudu gananawak amathi padawi hobawana lada amathiwarunge athi wishala postar katawut marga depasa alawa atha.
ohu thawath mahaluwa giyeya.
apata test tharaga wagema ekdina tharagath thibuna.
aa halape, ohe aanduwe wada karana kale idan mahinda mahaththayage minihek kiyanne aththada?
wijaya - pimbaura prathamika widyalaye shishyathwa hapannu
bitiayi mila adhika nisa aawata giyata hamathanama yodannath ba.

sapthambar 17 dina paswaru 7.00 ta anagarika dharmapala bauddha madhyasthanaya asalin aarambha karana perahara kada 50 pedesa, maha rohal watarawumen, pi්raman mawatha mayilagashandiya buddhagaya mawathe sancharaya kara nawatha madhyama rathri pasuwi wiharasthanayata gewadimen buddhagaya maha perahara nimawata pathwanu atha.

namuth ese nowu awastha eeta wada boho wadi wiya.me mohothe, thamage mulu sirurama welagath ee athishaya prabala hangima idiriye,sasandana kala, lowa sada nowisanduna abhirahasak se salakena me aalaya, kawara nam hangimakda?
dhawala atheku wana sawiye nomathi bawa, dadayakkaraya puna puna widaneta ki namudu, in palak nowiya.
me samaga obata watina pothakda ewami .
